View.Sql:
-- ============================================= -- Author: <Author,,Name> -- Create date: <Create Date,,> -- Description: <Description,,> -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE sp_test -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here SELECT * from AF_FORM END

CREATE VIEW V_CMR_STAF AS SELECT dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATION, dbo.HR_STAFF.ICARD, dbo.HR_STAFF.MAJOR, dbo.SYS_USER.USER_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL AS STAFF_EMAIL, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.MOBILE, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.GENDER, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.SNAME AS DEPT_SNAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.SORT_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDTIME, dbo.SYS_USER.USER_NAME, dbo.SYS_USER.SNAME AS USER_SNAME FROM dbo.SYS_USER INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.SYS_USER.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID INNER JOIN dbo.HR_DEPT ON dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID

CREATE VIEW V_CRM_CUSTTOMER AS SELECT dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyAddress, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopNameURL, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustSex, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Birthday, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.WangWangId, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustQQ, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.LastEditors, dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_Name, dbo.CRM_CUST.Job, dbo.CRM_CUST.RelationTxt, dbo.CRM_CUST.Recorder, dbo.CRM_CUST.Phone, dbo.CRM_CUST.ContactName, dbo.CRM_CUST.Email, dbo.CRM_CUST.Address, dbo.CRM_CUST.Trade, dbo.CRM_CUST.Type, dbo.CRM_CUST.State, dbo.CRM_CUST.IsSign, dbo.CRM_CUST.AddTime, dbo.CRM_CUST.EditTime, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.LoadHighSeasTime, dbo.CRM_CUST.MobPhone, dbo.CRM_CUST.PATH, dbo.CRM_CUST.PNAME FROM dbo.CRM_CUST INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER ON dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID = dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id

CREATE VIEW V_CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER AS SELECT dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.SID, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.Cus_ID, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.CustStatus, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.LastContactTime, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL AS STAFF_EMAIL, dbo.HR_DEPT.DeptName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyAddress, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopNameURL, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustSex, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Birthday, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.WangWangId, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustQQ, dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_Name, dbo.CRM_CUST.Job, dbo.CRM_CUST.RelationTxt, dbo.CRM_CUST.Recorder, dbo.CRM_CUST.Phone AS CUS_PHONE, dbo.CRM_CUST.ContactName, dbo.CRM_CUST.Email AS CUS_EMAIL, dbo.CRM_CUST.Address, dbo.CRM_CUST.Trade, dbo.CRM_CUST.Type, dbo.CRM_CUST.State, dbo.CRM_CUST.IsSign, dbo.CRM_CUST.AddTime, dbo.CRM_CUST.EditTime, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.LastEditors, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.MOBILE, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.HOME_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDR, dbo.HR_STAFF.MAJOR, dbo.HR_STAFF.WORK_TYPE_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.STATION_CODE FROM dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUST ON dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id = dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID ON dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.Cus_ID = dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id INNER JOIN dbo.HR_DEPT INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID ON dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.SID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID

CREATE VIEW V_CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS AS SELECT dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.SID, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.Cus_ID, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.NextContactTime, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.CustStatus, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ContactTime, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ContactRecords, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ID, dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_Name, dbo.CRM_CUST.Job, dbo.CRM_CUST.RelationTxt, dbo.CRM_CUST.Recorder, dbo.CRM_CUST.Phone AS CUS_PHONE, dbo.CRM_CUST.ContactName, dbo.CRM_CUST.ShopAddr, dbo.CRM_CUST.State, dbo.CRM_CUST.AddTime, dbo.CRM_CUST.EditTime, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyAddress, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopNameURL, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustSex, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Birthday, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.WangWangId, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustQQ, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.LastEditors, dbo.CRM_CUST.IsSign, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL, dbo.HR_DEPT.DeptName, dbo.CRM_CUST.Email AS CUS_EMAIL, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.SORT_NO, dbo.HR_DEPT.SNAME AS DEPT_SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.GENDER, dbo.HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.STATION_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.YMD, dbo.HR_STAFF.MOBILE, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.CERT_FLAG, dbo.HR_STAFF.HOME_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.TITLE_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.STATUS_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATION, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATIVE_PLACE, dbo.HR_STAFF.MAJOR, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDR FROM dbo.HR_STAFF INNER JOIN dbo.HR_DEPT ON dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS ON dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.Cus_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUST ON dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id = dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID ON dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.SID

CREATE VIEW V_CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_NOTCONTACT AS SELECT dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyName, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopName, dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_Name, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustQQ, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.WangWangId, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.LastContactTime, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.CustStatus, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.NextContactTime, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ContactTime, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.ShopNameURL, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CompanyAddress, dbo.CRM_CUST.Phone AS CUS_PHONE, dbo.CRM_CUST.Email AS CUS_EMAIL, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.CustStatus AS SCC_CustStatus, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL AS STA_EMAIL, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.LastEditors, dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.CustSex, dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.RNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.PATH, dbo.HR_STAFF.PNAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.SNAME AS DEPT_SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.HOME_TEL, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID, dbo.CRM_CUST.Job, dbo.CRM_CUST.RelationTxt, dbo.CRM_CUST.Recorder, dbo.CRM_CUST.MobPhone, dbo.CRM_CUST.ContactName, dbo.CRM_CUST.Address, dbo.CRM_CUST.Trade, dbo.HR_DEPT.ORG_ID FROM dbo.HR_DEPT INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUST INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER ON dbo.CRM_CUST.Cus_ID = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.Cus_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS ON dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.SID = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.SID AND dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.Cus_ID = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.Cus_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER ON dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER.Cus_ID = dbo.CRM_CUSTOMER.Cus_Id ON dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID = dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.SID WHERE (dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER_CONTACTRECORDS.ContactTime IS NULL)

CREATE VIEW V_CUSTHIGHSEAS AS SELECT a.Cus_ID, a.CompanyName, a.CompanyAddress, a.ShopName, a.ShopNameURL, a.CustSex, a.Birthday, a.WangWangId, a.CustQQ, a.LastEditors, a.Cus_Name, a.Job, a.RelationTxt, a.Recorder, a.Phone, a.ContactName, a.Email, a.Address, a.Type, a.Trade, a.State, a.IsSign, a.EditTime, a.AddTime, a.LoadHighSeasTime, a.MobPhone FROM dbo.V_CRM_CUSTTOMER AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRM_STAFF_CUSTOMER AS b ON a.Cus_ID = b.Cus_ID WHERE (b.Cus_ID IS NULL)

CREATE VIEW V_HR_CHECKINOUT AS SELECT dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.RNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.PATH, dbo.HR_STAFF.PNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.ORG_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.NAME, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.CHECKTIME, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.USERID, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.CHECKTYPE, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.VERIFYCODE, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.SENSORID, dbo.HR_STAFF.GENDER FROM dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID INNER JOIN dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT ON dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.USERID = dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.USERID

CREATE VIEW V_HR_CK_USERINFO AS SELECT dbo.HR_STAFF.USER_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.RNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.PATH, dbo.HR_STAFF.PNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.GENDER, dbo.HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.STATION_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.WORK_TYPE_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.TECH_LEVEL_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.ICARD, dbo.HR_STAFF.YMD, dbo.HR_STAFF.MOBILE, dbo.HR_STAFF.CERT_FLAG, dbo.HR_STAFF.FIXED_FLAG, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.ON_POS_FLAG, dbo.HR_STAFF.PROFESSION_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.PROFESSION_BGN_DATE, dbo.HR_STAFF.JOIN_DATE, dbo.HR_STAFF.POLITICAL_STATUS_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.TITLE_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.STATUS_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.HOME_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDR, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATION, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATIVE_PLACE, dbo.HR_STAFF.POST_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.DEGREE_CODE, dbo.HR_STAFF.GRAD_SCHOOL, dbo.HR_STAFF.GRAD_DATE, dbo.HR_STAFF.MAJOR, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDTIME, dbo.HR_STAFF.EDITIME, dbo.HR_STAFF.REMARK, dbo.HR_STAFF.MARRIAGE_FLAG, dbo.HR_STAFF.PID, dbo.HR_STAFF.EXP1, dbo.HR_STAFF.EXP2, dbo.HR_STAFF.EXP3, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.BADGENUMBER, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SSN, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.NAME, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.TITLE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.PAGER, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.BIRTHDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.HIREDDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STREET, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.CITY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STATE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.ZIP, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OPHONE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.FPHONE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.VERIFICATIONMETHOD, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.DEFAULTDEPTID, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SECURITYFLAGS, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.ATT, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.INLATE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OUTEARLY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OVERTIME, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SEP, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.HOLIDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.MINZU, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.PASSWORD, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.LUNCHDURATION, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.MVerifyPass, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.USERID, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.P_DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.SORT_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.PHOTO, dbo.HR_DEPT.ORG_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.SNAME AS Dept_SNAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.RNAME AS Dept_RNAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.PATH AS Dept_PATH, dbo.HR_DEPT.PNAME AS Dept_PNAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.SUB_NUM, dbo.HR_DEPT.USE_FLAG FROM dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID INNER JOIN dbo.HR_DEPT ON dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID

CREATE VIEW V_IMUSER AS SELECT dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, dbo.SYS_USER.USER_NAME, dbo.SYS_USER.PASS, dbo.SYS_USER.EMAIL, dbo.SYS_USER.USER_TYPE, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.PHOTO, dbo.HR_STAFF.GENDER, dbo.HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.YMD, dbo.HR_STAFF.MOBILE, dbo.HR_STAFF.OFFICE_TEL, dbo.HR_STAFF.ADDR, dbo.HR_STAFF.EMAIL AS STAFF_EMAIL, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATION, dbo.HR_STAFF.NATIVE_PLACE, dbo.HR_STAFF.POST_NO, dbo.HR_ORG.ORG_NAME, dbo.HR_ORG.P_ORG_ID, dbo.HR_ORG.PATH AS ORG_PATH, dbo.HR_ORG.ORG_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.P_DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_DEPT.PATH FROM dbo.HR_ORG RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HR_DEPT ON dbo.HR_ORG.ORG_ID = dbo.HR_DEPT.ORG_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYS_USER RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.SYS_USER.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID ON dbo.HR_DEPT.DEPT_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID

create view V_MemberScore_Exam2Item as ( select t.[MSID] ,t.[MemberID] ,t.[ExamID] as MemberScore_ExamID ,t.[ItemID] as MemberScore_ItemID ,t.[ScoreNum] as MemberScore_ScoreNum ,t.[GetNum] as MemberScore_GetNum ,t.[Answer] as MemberScore_Answer,x.* from EDU_Member2Score t,EDU_Exam2Item x where t.itemid=x.itemid )

create view V_MemberScore_ExamItem as ( select t.[MSID] ,t.[MemberID] ,t.[ExamID] as MemberScore_ExamID ,t.[ItemID] as MemberScore_ItemID ,t.[ScoreNum] as MemberScore_ScoreNum ,t.[GetNum] as MemberScore_GetNum ,t.[Answer] as MemberScore_Answer,x.* from EDU_MemberScore t,EDU_ExamItem x where t.itemid=x.itemid )

CREATE VIEW V_PUSH_SNSMESSAGE AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT a.ID, a.FROM_ID, a.TO_ID, a.ADDTIME, a.MESSAGE, a.STATUS, c.STAFF_NAME AS from_name, d.STAFF_NAME AS to_name, b.time FROM dbo.PUSH_SNSMESSAGE AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF AS c ON a.FROM_ID = c.STAFF_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF AS d ON a.TO_ID = d.STAFF_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(ADDTIME) AS time, FROM_ID, TO_ID FROM dbo.PUSH_SNSMESSAGE GROUP BY FROM_ID, TO_ID) AS b ON a.FROM_ID = b.FROM_ID AND a.TO_ID = b.TO_ID WHERE (a.STATUS = 0)

CREATE VIEW V_SchedulingSchClass AS SELECT dbo.HR_Scheduling.ID, dbo.HR_Scheduling.schYear, dbo.HR_Scheduling.schMonth, dbo.HR_Scheduling.schDay, dbo.HR_Scheduling.schType, dbo.HR_SchClass.schName, dbo.HR_SchClass.LateMinutes, dbo.HR_SchClass.EarlyMinutes, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckIn, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckOut, dbo.HR_SchClass.Color, dbo.HR_SchClass.IsOverTime, dbo.HR_Scheduling.schClassid, dbo.HR_SchClass.StartHour, dbo.HR_SchClass.StartMin, dbo.HR_SchClass.EndHour, dbo.HR_SchClass.EndMin, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckInHour1, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckInMin1, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckInHour2, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckInMin2, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckOutHour1, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckOutMin1, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckOutMin2, dbo.HR_SchClass.CheckOutHour2, dbo.HR_SchClass.schNumber, dbo.HR_SchClass.schUnit, dbo.HR_Scheduling.STAFF_ID, HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, HR_STAFF.SNAME, HR_STAFF.RNAME, HR_STAFF.PATH, HR_STAFF.PNAME, HR_STAFF.STAFF_NO, HR_STAFF.ORG_ID, HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID, HR_STAFF.GENDER, HR_STAFF.POS_NAME, HR_STAFF.STATION_CODE, HR_STAFF.WORK_TYPE_CODE, HR_STAFF.TECH_LEVEL_CODE, HR_STAFF.ICARD, HR_STAFF.STATUS_CODE FROM dbo.HR_SchClass RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF AS HR_STAFF INNER JOIN dbo.HR_Scheduling ON HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_Scheduling.STAFF_ID ON dbo.HR_SchClass.schClassid = dbo.HR_Scheduling.schClassid

CREATE VIEW V_STEP_FORM AS SELECT b.STEP_FID, b.WFID, b.PROCID, b.STEP_ID, b.STEP_FID_TPL, a.COLUMN_ID, a.FORM_ID, a.TB_ID, a.FIELD_ID, a.SHOW_NAME, a.CTRL_TYPE, a.MAX_VAL, a.MIN_VAL, a.IS_NEED, a.CAL_FORMULA, a.SUM_FIELD_ID, a.SORT_NO, a.IS_DEFAULT, a.FILL_TYPE, a.EXD_INFO, a.SHOWIN_FORM, c.FIELD_NAME,c.TYPE_CODE,c.DB_TYPE FROM dbo.TF_F_COLUMN AS a RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.WF_STEP_FORM AS b ON a.COLUMN_ID = b.COLUMN_ID AND a.FORM_ID = b.FORM_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.TF_TB_FIELD AS c ON c.FIELD_ID = a.FIELD_ID

CREATE VIEW V_STEP_FORM_TPL AS SELECT b.STEP_FID, b.WFID, b.PROCID, b.STEP_ID, a.COLUMN_ID, a.FORM_ID, a.TB_ID, a.FIELD_ID, a.SHOW_NAME, a.CTRL_TYPE, a.MAX_VAL, a.MIN_VAL, a.IS_NEED, a.CAL_FORMULA, a.SUM_FIELD_ID, a.SORT_NO, a.IS_DEFAULT, a.FILL_TYPE, a.EXD_INFO, a.SHOWIN_FORM, c.FIELD_NAME,c.TYPE_CODE,c.DB_TYPE FROM dbo.TF_F_COLUMN AS a RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.WF_STEP_FORM_TPL AS b ON a.COLUMN_ID = b.COLUMN_ID AND a.FORM_ID = b.FORM_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.TF_TB_FIELD AS c ON c.FIELD_ID = a.FIELD_ID
CREATE VIEW v_test AS SELECT AF_ID, AF_NAME, AF_STATUS, AF_NOTE, xdd, SORT_NO FROM dbo.AF_FORM
CREATE VIEW v_test2 AS SELECT MemberID, MemberScore_ExamID FROM dbo.V_MemberScore_Exam2Item

CREATE VIEW V_TF_F_COLUMN AS SELECT dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.FIELD_NAME, dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.TYPE_CODE, dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.DB_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.COLUMN_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FORM_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.TB_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FIELD_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOW_NAME, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.CTRL_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.MAX_VAL, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.MIN_VAL, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_NEED, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.CAL_FORMULA, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SUM_FIELD_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SORT_NO, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_DEFAULT, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FILL_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.EXD_INFO, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOWIN_FORM, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SUBMIT_INPUT, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOWIN_HEADER FROM dbo.TF_F_COLUMN LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TF_TB_FIELD ON dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FIELD_ID = dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.FIELD_ID WHERE (dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_DEFAULT = 0)

CREATE VIEW V_USERCHECKINOUT AS SELECT dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.USERID, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.CHECKTIME, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.CHECKTYPE, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.VERIFYCODE, dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.SENSORID, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.BADGENUMBER, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SSN, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.NAME, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.GENDER, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.TITLE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.PAGER, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.BIRTHDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.HIREDDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STREET, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.CITY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STATE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.ZIP, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OPHONE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.FPHONE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.VERIFICATIONMETHOD, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.DEFAULTDEPTID, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SECURITYFLAGS, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.ATT, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.INLATE, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OUTEARLY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.OVERTIME, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.SEP, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.HOLIDAY, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.MINZU, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.PASSWORD, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.LUNCHDURATION, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.MVerifyPass, dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.PHOTO, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NO, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_NAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.SNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.RNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.PATH, dbo.HR_STAFF.ORG_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.PNAME, dbo.HR_STAFF.DEPT_ID, dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID FROM dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT INNER JOIN dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO ON dbo.HR_CHECKINOUT.USERID = dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.USERID INNER JOIN dbo.HR_STAFF ON dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STAFF_ID = dbo.HR_STAFF.STAFF_ID WHERE (dbo.HR_CK_USERINFO.STAFF_ID IS NOT NULL)

CREATE VIEW V_WEC_MODEL_SET AS SELECT dbo.WEC_MODEL.TYPE, dbo.WEC_MODEL.PIC_URL, dbo.WEC_MODEL.PATH, dbo.WEC_MODEL.ADDTIME, dbo.WEC_MODEL.STATUS, dbo.WEC_MODEL.NAME, dbo.WEC_MODEL_SET.M_ID, dbo.WEC_MODEL_SET.A_ID, dbo.WEC_MODEL_SET.ID FROM dbo.WEC_MODEL INNER JOIN dbo.WEC_MODEL_SET ON dbo.WEC_MODEL.ID = dbo.WEC_MODEL_SET.M_ID

CREATE VIEW V_WEC_REQUEST AS SELECT dbo.WEC_REQUEST.AID, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.TID, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.KEYWORD, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.MATCH_TYPE, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.MEMO, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.KIND, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.STATUS, dbo.WEC_REQUEST.ADDTIME, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.ID, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.TID AS Expr1, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.TITLE, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.SORT_ID, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.PICURL, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.TYPE_ID, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.TYPE_VALUE, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.STATUS AS Expr2, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.ADDTIME AS Expr3, dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.WEC_REQUEST LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL ON dbo.WEC_REQUEST.TID = dbo.WEC_REQUEST_DETAIL.TID

CREATE VIEW V_WFCOLUMN_EXD AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.FIELD_NAME, dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.TYPE_CODE, dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.DB_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.COLUMN_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FORM_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.TB_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FIELD_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOW_NAME, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.CTRL_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.MAX_VAL, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.MIN_VAL, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_NEED, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.CAL_FORMULA, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SUM_FIELD_ID, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SORT_NO, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_DEFAULT, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FILL_TYPE, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.EXD_INFO, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOWIN_FORM, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SUBMIT_INPUT, dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SHOWIN_HEADER, dbo.WF_STEP_FORM.STEP_ID FROM dbo.TF_F_COLUMN LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TF_TB_FIELD ON dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.FIELD_ID = dbo.TF_TB_FIELD.FIELD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.WF_STEP_FORM ON dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.COLUMN_ID = dbo.WF_STEP_FORM.COLUMN_ID WHERE (dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.IS_DEFAULT = 0) ORDER BY dbo.TF_F_COLUMN.SORT_NO
